bilingual.source: This will insure a digital Low when the contact is open, and a digital High when closed.
bilingual.target: 数字信号的高当被关时，这将保证数字的低的当接触是开着的。

bilingual.source: A digital view of the stellar nurseries of the Orion Nebula.
bilingual.target: 阿的猎户座星云的恒星托儿所数字的看法.

yingyinNormal.en: Think of it. Electrical brain. A digital computer. Digital computer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 想想看，电子大脑，一个数字计算机。数字计算机。

yingyinNormal.en: Why? They're state-of-the-art digital projection, 20-channel surround sound.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么？那里有最先进的数码影像技术，20道环绕立体声。

yingyinNormal.en: Now this little bastard hacks into anything that's on a digital network.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个小混蛋黑了数字网络里的所有东西。

yingyinNormal.en: What? You know, the virtual pickle tickle. The digital bow chicka bow bow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？你懂的，就是虚拟的很黄很暴力的那种啊，数字化的嘿嘿咻咻。

yingyinNormal.en: Digital immunization chip. We were all ready to go into production next year.
yingyinNormal.zh: 数字免疫芯片，我们准备明年就投产。

yingyinNormal.en: The boxes on the lines allow the Machine's digital signals to travel in that space.
yingyinNormal.zh: 线路上的盒子让机器的数据信号可以在其中传输。

yingyinNormal.en: I mean wouldn't that be a great story? Kind of like a fairy tale for the digital age.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是个很棒的故事吧？就像是数字时代的童话故事。

yingyinNormal.en: Is not the digital economy, which I called data economy, and everything is going to be changed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不仅仅是数字经济，我叫它数据经济，所有的东西都会被改变。

yingyinNormal.en: Places without surveillance, blind spots. It also comes in digital. This will be useful indeed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 标注了无监控处，盲点，还有电子版本。这个确实有用。

yingyinNormal.en: That's why he created the first digital Easter egg, and to find it, you didn't even have to win.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以他设计了第一个游戏彩蛋，要找到它，都不用打赢游戏。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't know. Maybe we're some kinda magnets. I know I am. That's why I can't wear a digital watch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不知道，也许我们是吸引人的磁石。我知道我是磁石，所以我不能戴电子表。

yingyinNormal.en: Hang on. They're showing a new digital print of Time Bandits. You wouldn't want to come, would you? Not really, no.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等一下。新的《时光大盗》今天开映，你不会想看的，对吧？一点都不想。

yingyinNormal.en: You traced money? What money? 65 Bitcoin worth approximately $39,000. We found it deposited in Robbie's digital wallet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 追踪钱款流向？什么钱款？65比特币，约值3.9万美元，我们发现这笔钱存在罗比的电子钱包里。

yingyinNormal.en: When it goes online, this building will be the most sophisticated data gathering system in history. The world's digital ghost, available 24/7.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一旦正式运行，这幢大楼会成为史上最完美的数据收集中心，成为全天候主宰世界的数字幽灵。

yingyinNormal.en: What are you working on? I'm removing my digital footprint from the internet so Amy Farrah Fowler can't find me and compel me to meet her mother. Ah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在干嘛呢？我在清除我的网络足迹，这样艾米·菲拉·福勒就找不到我了，也就没法逼我见她妈了。

yingyinNormal.en: IT technology and digital technology, is not the technology difference, is the difference of the way people think, the way people deal with the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: IT科技和数字科技，这不仅仅是不同的技术，而是人们思考方式的不同，人们对待这个世界方式的不同。

yingyinNormal.en: Cause they'll just let the NSA scan your digital ghost and they'll tell you who your roommate is based on everything you've ever said, written or clicked.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们只要请国家安全局扫描一下你的电子数据库，就可以给你分配好室友，这电子数据库记录了所有你说过的，写过的，点击过的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: relating to or using signals or information represented by discrete values of a physical quantity such as voltage or magnetic polarization

examination_example.sentence: At the same time, the European Union, Spain, Britain and several other countries have all seriously contemplated <highlight>digital</highlight> services taxes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与此同时，欧盟、西班牙、英国和其他几个国家都在认真考虑征收数字服务税。

examination_example.sentence: In addition, new <highlight>digital</highlight> technologies have allowed more rapid trading of equities, quicker use of information, and thus shorter attention spans in financial markets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，新的数字技术使得股票交易更快，信息使用更快，从而缩短了金融市场的关注时间。

examination_example.sentence: For one thing, it is very slow compared to the pace of change within the <highlight>digital</highlight> economy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一方面，与数字经济里的变化速度相比，它非常缓慢。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: They are not trying to prove that the use of <highlight>digital</highlight> devices reduces young people's wellbeing .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们并不是试图证明数字设备的使用会降低年轻人的幸福感。

examination_example.sentence: They found that adolescents who spent a very small amount of time on <highlight>digital</highlight> devices-a couple of hours a week-had the highest wellbeing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们发现那些在每周只花两三个小时使用数码设备的青少年具有最高的幸福指数。

examination_example.sentence: Researchers believed students with high ACT scores would not show a significant decrease in performance due to their use of <highlight>digital</highlight> devices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员认为，ACT得分高的学生的表现不会因为使用电子设备而出现显著下降。

examination_example.sentence: The scientific community is recognizing that data can now be shared <highlight>digitally</highlight> in ways that were not possible before.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学社区正在意识到，现在数据可以用前所未有的方式进行数字共享。

sense_info_list.en: (of a clock or watch) showing the time by means of displayed digits rather than hands or a pointer
sense_info_list.zh: 数字的; 数字显示的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Highlighting, Post-It notes, dog-ears and other techniques allow for further customization that students value in print books over <highlight>digital</highlight> forms of books.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学生们可以通过划重点、贴便条、折书角和其它方法进一步定制自己的课本，这正是学生们觉得印刷书比数码书更有价值的地方。

examination_example.sentence: Because it's all <highlight>digital</highlight> it eliminates the used book market and eliminates any sharing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于它是全数字化的，它消除了二手书市场，消除了任何共享。

examination_example.sentence: "These <highlight>digital</highlight> products aren't just mechanisms for students to submit homework, they offer all kinds of features, "David Anderson, the executive director of higher education with the Association of American Publishers, told BuzzFeed News.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国出版商协会高等教育执行理事大卫·安德森(David Anderson)告诉 BuzzFeed News 说：“这些数字产品不仅是学生提交作业的一种机制，它们还具有各种功能。”

examination_example.sentence: A Pearson spokesperson told BuzzFeed News that "<highlight>digital</highlight> materials are less expensive and a good investment" that offer new features, like audio texts, personalized knowledge checks and expert videos.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 皮尔森(Pearson)公司的一位发言人对 BuzzFeedNews 说：“数字教材价格较低，是一项很好的投资。”它提供了新功能，例如音频文本，个性化知识检查和专家视频。

examination_example.sentence: After it is repaired, we will take <highlight>digital</highlight> photos of it and that will be available online.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 修复后，我们会为其拍摄数码照片，并在网上公布。

examination_example.sentence: As universities go <highlight>digital</highlight>, students are complaining of a new hit to their finances that's replacing — and sometimes joining — expensive textbooks: pricey online access codes that are required to complete coursework and submit assignments.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着大学数字化的发展，学生们抱怨他们的财务状况受到了新的冲击，它正在取代甚至有时加入昂贵的教科书：完成课程作业和提交作业所需的昂贵的在线访问代码。

examination_example.sentence: David Hunt, an associate professor in sociology at Augusta University, which has rolled out <highlight>digital</highlight> textbooks across its math and psychology departments, told BuzzFeed News that he understands the utility of using systems that require access codes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 奥古斯塔大学社会学副教授戴维·亨特(David Hunt)已在其数学和心理学部门推出了数字教科书，他对 BuzzFeed News 表示，他了解使用需要访问代码的系统的实用性。

examination_example.sentence: McGraw Hill, which controls 21% of the higher education market, reported in March that its <highlight>digital</highlight> content sales exceeded print sales for the first time in 2015.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 控制21%高等教育市场的麦格劳-希尔(McGraw Hill)公司在3月份报告中称，其数字内容销售额在2015年首次超过了印刷品销售额。

sense_info_list.en: (of a clock or watch) showing the time by means of displayed digits rather than hands or a pointer
sense_info_list.zh: 数字的; 数字显示的

examination_example.sentence: Ariely ran an experiment and found that when only the two "real" choices were offered, more people chose the less-expensive <highlight>digital</highlight> subscription.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Ariely做了一个实验，发现当只有两个“真正”的选择时，更多的人选择了更便宜的数字订阅。

examination_example.sentence: More readers the <highlight>digital</highlight> over the print edition.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与印刷版相比，数字版的读者更多。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>digital</highlight> subscription was $ 59, the print subscription was $ 125, and the print plus <highlight>digital</highlight> subscription was also $ 125.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数字订阅是59美元，印刷订阅是125美元，印刷加数字订阅也是125美元。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 数码的; 数字(信息)的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: In a <highlight>digital</highlight> age, we almost never write things by hand.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在数字时代，我们几乎从不用手写东西。

examination_example.sentence: No doubt that's one reason why <highlight>digital</highlight> stickers(表情图) are used and enjoyed by so many people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毫无疑问，这就是为什么这么多人使用和享受数字表情图的原因之一。

examination_example.sentence: More recently, in 1956, came the <highlight>digital</highlight> clock.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近，也就是1956年，出现了电子钟。
